entry.title: Tech Path
entry.content: (Under Development) Built with ReactJS, Tech Path aims to solve the problem of having thousands of free online coding tutorials, articles, and projects at your finger tips but no good way to keep track of what you’ve finished, how you’re progressing, and which one you’d like to do next

entry.title: Fair Split Calculator
entry.content: A simple ReactJS calculator that takes two earnings and determines the amount each should pay towards an inputed set of household bills.

entry.title: Scribe
entry.content: A WordPress theme that excels as a writing tool. Built with _s, Foundation, and Sass.

entry.title: Phantom
entry.content: A minimalist, responsive portfolio theme for Jekyll with Bootstrap.

entry.title: Grocery Store Monopoly Exchange
entry.content: A SPA that lists a directory of user inputed tickets from the grocery store Monopoly game to facilitate exchanges with friends & family built with JavaScript and Angular.

entry.title: Calculator
entry.content: A functional calculator that can perform basic operations built with JavaScript, jQuery, & Sass

entry.title: Simon Game
entry.content: The classic memory game built with JavaScript, jQuery, & Sass.
